Title: The Unbearable Like-Likeness of Gene
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Holly Schlesinger, Nora Smith (story)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Plot: An incredibly annoying girl develops a crush on Gene, but he can't bring himself to dump her after he finds out her father has a music studio in their home.
